original_title: Train derails in Orugodawatte; Railway operations delayed
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Train operations along the main railway line were delayed on Monday (13) morning due to a derailment in Orugodawatte.
Sri Lanka Railways said that several fasteners, a Railway Track Component, had been removed and stolen, resulting in the derailment.
Sri Lanka Railways considers the act of removing the fasteners as theft, and noted that steps were taken to restore operations.
